mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TODO_KEY, X.TODO_CO_CD, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CO_CD) AS TODO_CO_CD_NM, TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID) AS TODO_DIV1_CODE_NM, TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID) AS TODO_DIV2_CODE_NM, TODO_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.TODO_ID) AS TODO_NM, NULL AS TODO_CHK, TO_CHAR(X.TODO_CF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TODO_CF_DT, TODO_CF_OPN, X.SALES_CD, Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, (SELECT T.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 T WHERE T.CLNT_CD =Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD) AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM, Y.CLNT_PJT, Y.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20) AS ORDRS_DTL_DIV20_NM, Y.PRDT_CD, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_CD_NM, Y.ITEM_DIV, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.ITEM_DIV) AS ITEM_DIV_NM, Y.EQP_NM, X.PG_PATH, X.TODO_NO, X.TODO_CODE_KIND, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CODE_KIND) AS TODO_CODE_KIND_NM, X.TODO_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CODE_ID) AS TODO_CODE_NM, CASE WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1010' THEN M1.WBS_PLAN_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1020' THEN M2.WBS_RSLTS_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV2010' THEN M2.WBS_RSLTS_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1030' THEN M3.ISS_CNTS END AS TODO_CNTS, X.TODO_FILE_TRGT_KEY, X.CREAT_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.CREAT_ID) AS CREAT_NM, X.CREAT_PGM, TO_CHAR(X.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DTTM, TO_CHAR(X.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM1, X.UDT_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.UDT_ID) AS UDT_NM, X.UDT_PGM, TO_CHAR(X.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UDT_DTTM FROM TB_WB20M02 X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X1.CO_CD, X1.SALES_CD, Y1.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, -- 고객사 Y1.CLNT_PJT, -- 고객사 PJT X1.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, -- 신작구분 X1.PRDT_CD, -- 제품구분 X1.ITEM_DIV, -- 아이템구분 X1.EQP_NM -- 설비명 FROM TB_CR02D02 X1 INNER JOIN TB_CR02M01 Y1 ON X1.CO_CD = Y1.CO_CD AND X1.ORDRS_NO = Y1.ORDRS_NO ) Y ON X.TODO_CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = Y.SALES_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB01M01 M1 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M1.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M1.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M1.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M1.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB02M01 M2 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M2.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M2.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M2.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M2.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB03M01 M3 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M3.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M3.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M3.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M3.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID ) T
WHERE T.TODO_CO_CD = #{coCd} AND T.CREAT_DTTM1 BETWEEN #{wbsPlansDt} AND #{wbsPlaneDt}
AND T.SALES_CD LIKE '%${salesCd}%'
AND T.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LIKE '%${clntCd}%'
AND T.ORDRS_CLNT_NM LIKE '%${clntNm}%'
AND T.PRDT_CD LIKE '%${prdtDiv}%'
AND T.PRDT_CD_NM LIKE '%${prdtDivNm}%'
AND T.ITEM_DIV LIKE '%${prdtItem}%'
AND T.CLNT_PJT LIKE '%${wbsClntPjt}%'
AND T.EQP_NM LIKE '%${eqp_nm}%'
AND T.TODO_ID = '${salesMngId}'
AND T.TODO_NM LIKE '%${salesMngNm}%'

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TODO_KEY, X.TODO_CO_CD, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CO_CD) AS TODO_CO_CD_NM, TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID) AS TODO_DIV1_CODE_NM, TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID) AS TODO_DIV2_CODE_NM, TODO_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.TODO_ID) AS TODO_NM, NULL AS TODO_CHK, TO_CHAR(X.TODO_CF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TODO_CF_DT, TODO_CF_OPN, X.SALES_CD, Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, (SELECT T.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 T WHERE T.CLNT_CD =Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD) AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM, Y.CLNT_PJT, Y.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20) AS ORDRS_DTL_DIV20_NM, Y.PRDT_CD, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_CD_NM, Y.ITEM_DIV, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.ITEM_DIV) AS ITEM_DIV_NM, Y.EQP_NM, X.PG_PATH, X.TODO_NO, X.TODO_CODE_KIND, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CODE_KIND) AS TODO_CODE_KIND_NM, X.TODO_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CODE_ID) AS TODO_CODE_NM, CASE WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1010' THEN M1.WBS_PLAN_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1020' THEN M2.WBS_RSLTS_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV2010' THEN M2.WBS_RSLTS_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1030' THEN M3.ISS_CNTS END AS TODO_CNTS, X.TODO_FILE_TRGT_KEY, X.CREAT_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.CREAT_ID) AS CREAT_NM, X.CREAT_PGM, TO_CHAR(X.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DTTM, TO_CHAR(X.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM1, X.UDT_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.UDT_ID) AS UDT_NM, X.UDT_PGM, TO_CHAR(X.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UDT_DTTM, X.PG_PARAM FROM TB_WB20M02 X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X1.CO_CD, X1.SALES_CD, Y1.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, -- 고객사 Y1.CLNT_PJT, -- 고객사 PJT X1.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, -- 신작구분 X1.PRDT_CD, -- 제품구분 X1.ITEM_DIV, -- 아이템구분 X1.EQP_NM -- 설비명 FROM TB_CR02D02 X1 INNER JOIN TB_CR02M01 Y1 ON X1.CO_CD = Y1.CO_CD AND X1.ORDRS_NO = Y1.ORDRS_NO ) Y ON X.TODO_CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = Y.SALES_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB01M01 M1 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M1.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M1.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M1.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M1.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB02M01 M2 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M2.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M2.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M2.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M2.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB03M01 M3 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M3.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M3.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M3.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M3.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID ) T
WHERE T.TODO_CO_CD = #{coCd} AND T.CREAT_DTTM1 BETWEEN #{wbsPlansDt} AND #{wbsPlaneDt}
AND T.SALES_CD LIKE '%${salesCd}%'
AND T.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LIKE '%${clntCd}%'
AND T.ORDRS_CLNT_NM LIKE '%${clntNm}%'
AND T.PRDT_CD LIKE '%${prdtDiv}%'
AND T.PRDT_CD_NM LIKE '%${prdtDivNm}%'
AND T.ITEM_DIV LIKE '%${prdtItem}%'
AND T.CLNT_PJT LIKE '%${wbsClntPjt}%'
AND T.EQP_NM LIKE '%${eqp_nm}%'
AND T.TODO_ID = '${salesMngId}'
AND T.TODO_NM LIKE '%${salesMngNm}%'
AND RN BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_WB20M01 SET TODO_CF_DT = #{todoCfDt}, UDT_ID = #{creatId}, UDT_PGM = #{creatPgm}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE TODO_KEY = #{todoKey}
UPDATE TB_WB20M01 SET TODO_CF_DT = #{todoCfDt}, TODO_CF_OPN = #{todoCfOpn}, UDT_ID = #{creatId}, UDT_PGM = #{creatPgm}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE TODO_KEY = #{todoKey}
mapper.select:
SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TODO_KEY, X.TODO_CO_CD, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CO_CD) AS TODO_CO_CD_NM, TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_DIV1_CODE_ID) AS TODO_DIV1_CODE_NM, TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID) AS TODO_DIV2_CODE_NM, TODO_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.TODO_ID) AS TODO_NM, NULL AS TODO_CHK, TO_CHAR(X.TODO_CF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TODO_CF_DT, TODO_CF_OPN, X.SALES_CD, Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, (SELECT T.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 T WHERE T.CLNT_CD =Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD) AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM, Y.CLNT_PJT, Y.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20) AS ORDRS_DTL_DIV20_NM, Y.PRDT_CD, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_CD_NM, Y.ITEM_DIV, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = Y.ITEM_DIV) AS ITEM_DIV_NM, Y.EQP_NM, X.PG_PATH, X.TODO_NO, X.TODO_CODE_KIND, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CODE_KIND) AS TODO_CODE_KIND_NM, X.TODO_CODE_ID, (SELECT T.CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 T WHERE T.CODE_ID = X.TODO_CODE_ID) AS TODO_CODE_NM, CASE WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1010' THEN M1.WBS_PLAN_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1020' THEN M2.WBS_RSLTS_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV2010' THEN M2.WBS_RSLTS_CNTS WHEN TODO_DIV2_CODE_ID = 'TODODIV1030' THEN M3.ISS_CNTS END AS TODO_CNTS, X.TODO_FILE_TRGT_KEY, X.CREAT_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.CREAT_ID) AS CREAT_NM, X.CREAT_PGM, TO_CHAR(X.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DTTM, TO_CHAR(X.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM1, X.UDT_ID, (SELECT T.NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 T WHERE T.ID = X.UDT_ID) AS UDT_NM, X.UDT_PGM, TO_CHAR(X.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UDT_DTTM, X.PG_PARAM FROM TB_WB20M02 X LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT X1.CO_CD, X1.SALES_CD, Y1.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, -- 고객사 Y1.CLNT_PJT, -- 고객사 PJT X1.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, -- 신작구분 X1.PRDT_CD, -- 제품구분 X1.ITEM_DIV, -- 아이템구분 X1.EQP_NM -- 설비명 FROM TB_CR02D02 X1 INNER JOIN TB_CR02M01 Y1 ON X1.CO_CD = Y1.CO_CD AND X1.ORDRS_NO = Y1.ORDRS_NO ) Y ON X.TODO_CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = Y.SALES_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB01M01 M1 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M1.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M1.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M1.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M1.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB02M01 M2 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M2.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M2.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M2.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M2.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_WB03M01 M3 ON X.TODO_CO_CD = M3.CO_CD AND X.SALES_CD = M3.SALES_CD AND X.TODO_CODE_KIND = M3.WBS_PLAN_CODE_KIND AND X.TODO_CODE_ID = M3.WBS_PLAN_CODE_ID ) T
WHERE T.TODO_CO_CD = #{coCd} AND T.CREAT_DTTM1 BETWEEN #{wbsPlansDt} AND #{wbsPlaneDt}
AND T.SALES_CD LIKE '%${salesCd}%'
AND T.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LIKE '%${clntCd}%'
AND T.ORDRS_CLNT_NM LIKE '%${clntNm}%'
AND T.PRDT_CD LIKE '%${prdtDiv}%'
AND T.PRDT_CD_NM LIKE '%${prdtDivNm}%'
AND T.ITEM_DIV LIKE '%${prdtItem}%'
AND T.CLNT_PJT LIKE '%${wbsClntPjt}%'
AND T.EQP_NM LIKE '%${eqp_nm}%'
AND T.TODO_ID = '${salesMngId}'
AND T.TODO_NM LIKE '%${salesMngNm}%'
